entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023
